column4: What's a good util to try for file recovery from a bad drive? Disk utillity says "drive has a few bad sectors" and it's letting me mount one of the partitions, but the partition I want to see is "unavailable" .. :(  (The drive is NTFS from a Win2k8 server)
I used the backup drive to stop a bullet from hitting a pregnant lady during the raid, it saved her baby's life but all I have is the HDD now..
